channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 03/07/2024 # New Features # User status: Support adjusting team members status to active & inactive for better member list management. New STT model: The new STT model is now available, offering improved accuracy. Bugfix # Fixed error when joining a workspace. 02/22/2024 # New Features # Support for Google education account invitations: if you are using a Google Education account, please invite meet@seasalt.ai to your calendar invite to use SeaMeet Reduced workspace creation time Plan change notification Notification for plan upgrade options on browser extension SeaMeet Copilot can directly join if meet@seaslt.
